name: Beijing, Chine
description: Traveling is a quintessential part of enriching our lives and building out new memories. You see new sites, try new foods, hear new languages, and learn new things which lead to new positive memories.That said, our trips don’t always go that way. You come home to find out there is something you missed, the food you didn’t try, or a masterpiece you forgot to schedule in. We often go online and read recommendations that are vastly written by people who could not consider themselves locals. This is why we source our content from experts who live in each destination and update our articles frequently.
